parameter.value: Hey there |PLAYERNAME|! My father, the major, collects various objects found through out this world. Want to {trade}? I will only buy from you.

wolf paw, 5897, 25;dheister leather, 5878, 45;bear paw, 5896, 35;troll hair, 10606, 60;sword scabbard, 12449, 65;grub horn, 11192, 70;giant eye, 11197, 85;honeycomb, 5902, 35;poisonous slime, 10557, 100
